item.description:
The topic of this event is finding your voice and your people. We'll talk about how to use your unique voice to build trust and attract loyal fans who buy up everything you have to offer.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rq

Date: Thursday, October 4, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Leah Shapiro. Leah is a life activator and kick-ass catalyst. Her super power is helping you identify and break free of the stories that hold you back and keep you playing small. She is an expert at helping you own your super powers and bring more YOU-NESS out in the world so you can finally live the life you are here to live.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the definitive business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rq

During this program you will learn:

  • The #1 secret to attracting loyal fans who buy up everything you have to offer.
  • The importance of finding your voice in your business.
  • How to think about what's the 'right way' to show up in business and your marketing.
  • What is a freak flag and how flying yours can build trust and attracts your right people.
  • The biggest mistake that you can make when it comes to creating your brand.
  • What to do if your freak flag offends someone.
  • The question you must answer. (Unless you want to be lost in the crowd.)

Get Show Access Info here: http://wp.me/P29Qf9-rq
item.name: How to Find Your Voice and Your People
